infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: BoomGhoom needs camera access for KYC verification and profile photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: BoomGhoom needs photo library access for uploading images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: BoomGhoom needs location access to show events near you.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow BoomGhoom to access your camera for KYC and photos.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow BoomGhoom to use your location to discover nearby events.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow BoomGhoom to access your photos for profile and event images.
